name: NEW Fine & Fleurie Luxury Bridal Robe in Light Ivory Italian Lace
description:
This luxurious heirloom bridal robe is handmade of the most beautiful ivory Italian lace and comes with an ivory silk sash. This is a perfect getting-ready robe for looking glamorous while you have your wedding day make-up and hair done. It's also an amazing garment for boudoir or maternity shoots. 

This robe makes a lovely gift and comes perfectly packaged for giving. Ships FedEx 3-day to the US.

Photos, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC
Images by Cinzia Bruschini Photography 

Available in a generously cut Italian size Small (fits American size Small/Med) or Medium (fits American size Med/Large)

Additional sizes available by special request: Jessica@fineandfleurie.com

name: NEW Fine & Fleurie Luxury Bridal Robe in Exclusive Medallion Italian Lace
description:
This luxurious heirloom bridal robe is handmade of the most beautiful ivory Italian lace in a gorgeous medallion style and comes with your choice of a blush pink or hot pink silk sash. This is a perfect getting-ready robe for looking glamorous while you have your wedding day make-up and hair done. It's also an amazing garment for boudoir or maternity shoots.

This robe makes a lovely gift and comes perfectly packaged for giving. Ships FedEx 3-day to the US.

Photos, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Images by Cinzia Bruschini Photography

Available in a generously cut Italian size Small (fits American size Small/Med) or Medium (fits American size Med/Large)

Additional sizes available by special request: Jessica@fineandfleurie.com

name: NEW Fine & Fleurie Luxury Bridal Robe Lingerie in Black Italian Lace
description:
This luxurious heirloom bridal robe is handmade of the most beautiful Italian lace and comes with black silk sash. This is a perfect getting-ready robe for looking glamorous while you have your wedding day make-up and hair done. It's also an amazing garment for boudoir or maternity shoots.

name: Sparkling Rhinestone Bridal Sash on Black Ivory or White Satin
description:
This gorgeous handmade Fine & Fleurie bridal belt is made to order and features lots of faceted rhinestone encrusted leaves, flowers and pretty swirls. The embellishment is perfectly symmetrical and widest at the middle, tapering to a pretty thin finish; it could be worn off to the side or centered.

Sash embelishment is approx. 10.5" in length and self-tie for a perfect fit.

Available on ivory or white satin ribbon. More colors are available by request: jessica@fineandfleurie.com

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography. 
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit

name: Sparkling Cushion Cut Bridal Earrings by Fine & Fleurie
description:
These dainty drop earrings are perfectly shimmery, 7/8" tall and 5/8" with elegant cushion cut Cubic Zirconia stones. They feature a delicate CZ micro pave frame and catch the light beautifully!

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography. 
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit.

name: Handbeaded Ivory Floral Lace Bridal Comb by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This gorgeous, heirloom-worthy comb features soft hand-beaded ivory lace, two Swarovski pearl flowers with silver leaves and vintage millinery leaves, all set on two small metal combs. The lace is flexible and meant to be worn in a style that wrap around the side of a low updo or chignon.

Handmade to order, ships priority mail 1-2 weeks from purchase date. 

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography. 
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit.

name: Handmade Silk Habotai Bridal Fascinator in Pink and Ivory by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This fascinator is the perfect little something for your wedding day updo. Two handcrafted silk habotai blooms are centered with sparkling rhinestones and tucked in behind them are touches of french netting, vintage velvet leaves in a sweet pale pink and silver beaded leaves. This fascinator is light and versatile, set on an alligator clip that will fit into most any hairstyle. 

Please select white or ivory silk for your flower. This style comes with light pink velvet leaves, regardless of silk color choice.

Handmade to order, ships priority mail 7 to 10 days from purchase date. 

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography. 
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit.

name: Silk Habotai Bridal Halo in Pink Ivory and Green by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This Fine & Fleurie original, handcrafted bridal halo features a gorgeous assortment of handmade silk habotai blooms, silver beaded leaves and vintage millinery leaves. This halo is meant to fit across the forehead and has satin ribbon ties for a custom fit.

Handmade to order, ships priority mail 2 weeks from purchase date.

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography.
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit.

name: Large Asymmetrical Bridal Comb by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This large sparkling comb is sure to catch lots of compliments on your big day! It's a tapered shape with lots of flowers and leave and absolutely loaded with rhinestone sparkle. This comb looks amazing tucked into a low bun hairstyle.

Handmade to order, ships priority mail 1-2 weeks from purchase date. 

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography. 
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit.

name: Rhinestone Flower Bridal Comb By Fine & Fleurie
description:
This sparkling comb is sure to catch lots of compliments on your big day! The shape is a flower with leaves, 3.5 inches across and absolutely loaded with rhinestone sparkle. This is a perfect bridal accessory or a gorgeous gift for your bridesmaids!
 
Handmade to order, ships priority mail 7-10 days from purchase date.

name: Double Layer Elbow-Length Veil by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This sweet and simple veil hits right at the elbow and features two layers of soft bridal tulle. The top layer is a bit shorter than the bottom layer and both have pretty rounded corners. Top layer can be used as a blusher depending on placement in hair. Attached to a metal comb. 

Handmade to order, ships priority mail 1-2 weeks from purchase date. 

Photography by Buffy Dekmar Photography. 
Images, designs and content © 2010-2013 Fine and Fleurie LLC 
Please do not use our images without proper credit.

You will receive one of each pins shown: large square, medium oval and small round style.

description:

Readily available in black ribbon/ivory lace or ivory ribbon/ivory lace.

name: Asymmetrical Birdcage Veil with Swarovski Pearl Edge by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This style of birdcage veil features a single comb and fits asymmetrically to cover one eye. It is hand-sewn to a small metal comb and has a finished lower edge with a pretty line of tiny Swarovski pearls.

Available in white or ivory.

Handmade to order, ships priority mail 1-2 weeks from purchase date.

name: Bridal Hairband with Mini Veil in Light Ivory by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This listing is for a handmade Fine & Fleurie mini-veil headband. This easy-to-wear piece features a skinny metal headband adorned with a touch of asymmetrical french netting and two handmade silk Habotai flowers.... so flirty and chic! Peeking out from behind the flowers are silver beaded leaves and vintage millinery leaves. Modern and unique!

Available in white/light ivory mix, shown. More colors available, please email for special orders: jessica [!at] fineandfleurie.com

Made-to-order ships in approx 10 business days.

name: Handmade Silk Habotai Bridal Mini Hat by Fine & Fleurie in Light Ivory and Pink
description:
This listing is for a bridal mini hat by Fine & Fleurie featuring four handmade silk habotai flowers. The largest flowers are very light ivory and the two smaller blossoms are the prettiest pale pink shade. Each flower is centered with a cluster of Swarovski pearls. Peeking out from behind the flowers are silver beaded leaves, a few pale green leaves and pretty eyelash lace. Ivory ribbon ties make a perfect fit and and elastic band provides additional stability.

This piece is handmade to order and ships 5 days after purchase.

I ship USPS Priority mail for US orders and USPS First Class for international buyers.

Images by The Studio B Photography; designs and content © 2010-2011 Fine and Fleurie LLC

name: Single Layer Tulle Bridal Veil Mid Length with Plain Edge in Ivory or White by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This listing is for a Fine & Fleurie handmade bridal veil. Each veil is hand-cut and hand-sewn in your choice of white or ivory tulle. 

This mid length veil has rounded corners, hits just below the hips (depending on the height of the bride and placement in hair) and is attached to a metal comb. This light style is perfect for the bride looking for a "barely there" veil. Simply gorgeous!

Ships USPS Priority mail.

Custom orders are available, please convo or email jessica [!at] fineandfleurie.com with requests.


Images by The Studio B Photography. Photos, designs and content © 2010-2011 Fine and Fleurie LLC

name: Double Layer Tulle Bridal Veil Waist Length with Plain Edge in Ivory or White by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This listing is for a Fine & Fleurie handmade bridal veil. Each veil is hand-cut and hand-sewn in your choice of white or ivory tulle. 

This waist length veil has rounded corners, hits right at the natural waist (depending on the height of the bride and placement in hair) and is attached to a metal comb. This is a double layer veil, the top layer is slightly shorter than the bottom layer and can be worn as a blusher. This light style is perfect for the bride looking for a "barely there" veil. Simply gorgeous!

Ships USPS Priority mail.

Custom orders are available, please convo or email jessica [!at] fineandfleurie.com with requests.

name: Glamorous Rhinestone Brooch Bridal Comb in Silver Sparkle
description:

2.25" at it's widest point.

Shipped via USPS Priority mail or USPS First class for international buyers.

name: Handmade Bridal Accessory Simple Feather Hair Pin by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This handmade Fine & Fleurie bridal hair pin featuring soft white feathers and a touch of French netting. Set on a silver bobby pin and centered with a lace rhinestone piece. So old-hollywood and gorgeous for a bride or bridesmaid!

Available in soft white or champagne (as in the last photo shown). More colors by special request.

***Due to the unique nature of feathers, each piece will slightly different, but equally as lovely.***

description:
This listing is for a bridal mini hat by Fine & Fleurie featuring handmade silk habotai flowers. The largest flowers are the lightest ivory shade, barely off-white, and it's surrounded by three smaller blossoms in the prettiest hot pink shade. Each pink flower is centered with a cluster of black Swarovski pearls. Peeking out from behind the flowers are handsewn rhinestone leaves and vintage millinery leaves. description:
This sweet mini hat features three entirely handmade dupioni silk flowers in the prettiest blush pink shade. Peeking out from behind the flower petals are vintage millinery leaves and a spray of rhinestone leaves. Each flower is centered with a faceted silver rhinestone focal, for just the right amount of sparkle. Hat has an elastic band for stability and ribbon ties for a perfect custom fit. 

**Matching shoe clips are sold seperately**

Jessica

Each flower is centered with ivory swarovski pearls and peeking out from behind the flowers are handsewn rhinestone leaves. Chocolate brown ribbon ties make for a perfect fit and and elastic band provides additional stability. This is a great piece for a fearless, whimsical bride.

name: Bridal Headband with Rhinestone Flower and Swarovski Pearls and Crystals by Fine & Fleurie
description:
This listing is for a gorgeous handmade Fine & Fleurie original bridal headband. It features a huge rhinestone flower piece that is loaded with swarovski crystals. A skinny metal headband wrapped with dozens more Swarovski pearls and crystals finishes the chic look. An amazing wedding day accent that looks gorgeous in most any hairstyle.

Shown in ivory/silver. Also available in white Swarovski pearl/silver metal. 

Shipped via USPS Priority Mail or USPS First Class International

Images by The Studio B Photography. Photos, designs and content © 2010-2011 Fine and Fleurie LLC

name: Bridal Birdcage Veil Single Layer Tulle in Matte Ivory or White Easy Fit Bandeau Style
description:
The perfect no-fuss birdcage veil. This bandeau style veil has a small 6-prong metal comb on each side that tucks securely into the hair and is completely hidden. Material is superior quality bridal tulle which is super soft and provides the absolute best fit; it lays so beautifully. Move the combs slightly forward and the veil dips just below the nose; move the combs back a little and the veils sits just below the eyes. So pretty and couldn't be easier! Each veil includes a mini bobby to secure the top of the veil, if you wish. 9" tall and 16" wide, this veil will fit most anyone, but please convo with questions! Hand-cut, hand-sewn and no patterns used!

Specify ivory or white upon checkout.
PLEASE NOTE: Rhinestone comb is no included in this listing; veil only :)

Ships USPS Priority mail.

Images by The Studio B Photography
Photos, designs and content © 2010-2011 Fine and Fleurie LLC

Surrounding the pretty silk flowers are gorgeous rhinestone leaves and a few Ivory vintage leaves that add lots of sparkle and texture. A self-tie grey satin ribbon makes for a perfect fit!

name: Bridal Wrap Belt or Headband with Three Handmade Silk Habotai Flowers By Fine & Fleurie
description:

Each is custom made, making it a one of a kind mini work of art featuring three entirely handmade silk habotai flowers with a mix of sparkling and matte pink stamens.. Peaking out from behind the petals are six vintage velvet leaves in the sweetest shade of fresh spring green. The flowers are hand-sewn onto 3 yards of pink velvet ribbon. The belt can be wrapped around the waist a number of times for a grecian-effect, or simply tied once in the back. An heirloom quality keepsake and a perfect finishing touch for you big day!

This piece is handmade to order and ships 10 days after purchase.

This listing is for a bridal mini hat by Fine & Fleurie featuring four handmade silk habotai flowers. The largest flower is the lightest ivory shade, barely off-white, and it's surrounded by three smaller blossoms in the prettiest pale peachy pink shade. Each flower is centered with a cluster of Swarovski pearls. Peeking out from behind the flowers are handsewn rhinestone leaves and pretty venise lace. Ribbon ties make for a perfect fit and and elastic band provides additional stability.

This piece is handmade to order and ships 10 days after purchase.

I ship USPS Priority mail for US orders and USPS First Class for international buyers.


Custom orders and boutique inquiries welcome. Email jessica [!at] fineandfleurie.com

The wide lace has been hand-sewn to the highest quality bridal tulle, and delicately adorned with dozens of tiny ivory Swarovski pearls. Metal comb attachment hold the veil securely in place. Truly an heirloom piece. Limited edition, more than 18 working hours put into each veil.

Six separate strands come together as one in this comfortable piece. Wire is slightly flexible, so it will fit into your hairstyle perfectly. name: Birdcage Veil with Swarovski Rhinestone Edge Bandeau Style in Ivory or White
description:
The perfect no-fuss birdcage veil!

This bandeau style veil has a small 6-prong metal comb on each side that tucks securely into the hair and is completely hidden. Material is superior quality french netting which is super soft and provides the absolute best fit; it lays so beautifully. This style features a silver Swarovski rhinestone edge.

Move the combs slightly forward and the veil dips just below the nose; move the combs back a little and the veils sits just below the eyes. So pretty and couldn't be easier! Each veil includes a mini bobby to secure the top of the veil, if you wish. 10" tall and 17" wide, this veil will fit most anyone, but please convo with questions! Finished bottom edge, hand-cut, hand-sewn and no patterns used!

Ships USPS Priority mail.

Pleae convo with questions or special requests!
